org.apache.hadoop.io

类 MapFile.Reader

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.io.MapFile.Reader
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable
    直接已知子类:
    ArrayFile.Reader, BloomMapFile.Reader, SetFile.Reader
    封闭类:
    MapFile

    public static class MapFile.Reader
extends Object
implements Closeable
    Provide access to an existing map.

        public void reset()
           throws IOException
        Re-positions the reader before its first key.
        抛出:
        IOException

      • midKey

        public WritableComparable midKey()
                          throws IOException
        Get the key at approximately the middle of the file. Or null if the file is empty.
        抛出:
        IOException

      • finalKey

        public void finalKey(WritableComparable key)
              throws IOException
        Reads the final key from the file.
        参数:
        key - key to read into
        抛出:
        IOException

      • seek

        public boolean seek(WritableComparable key)
             throws IOException
        Positions the reader at the named key, or if none such exists, at the first entry after the named key. Returns true iff the named key exists in this map.
        抛出:
        IOException

      • next

        public boolean next(WritableComparable key,
           Writable val)
             throws IOException
        Read the next key/value pair in the map into key and val. Returns true if such a pair exists and false when at the end of the map
        抛出:
        IOException

      • get

        public Writable get(WritableComparable key,
           Writable val)
             throws IOException
        Return the value for the named key, or null if none exists.
        抛出:
        IOException

      • getClosest

        public WritableComparable getClosest(WritableComparable key,
                            Writable val)
                              throws IOException
        Finds the record that is the closest match to the specified key. Returns key or if it does not exist, at the first entry after the named key. - * @param key - key that we're trying to find - * @param val - data value if key is found - * @return - the key that was the closest match or null if eof.
        抛出:
        IOException

      • getClosest

        public WritableComparable getClosest(WritableComparable key,
                            Writable val,
                            boolean before)
                              throws IOException
        Finds the record that is the closest match to the specified key.
        参数:
        key - - key that we're trying to find
        val - - data value if key is found
        before - - IF true, and key does not exist, return the first entry that falls just before the key. Otherwise, return the record that sorts just after.
        返回:
        - the key that was the closest match or null if eof.
        抛出:
        IOException

      • close

        public void close()
           throws IOException
        Close the map.
        指定者:
        close 在接口中 Closeable
        指定者:
        close 在接口中 AutoCloseable
        抛出:
        IOException
